message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value to us, we're considering an initial offer of $12000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a better price than your initial offer.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and are willing to adjust our offer to $10500. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while still being competitive for your needs.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I'm still a bit concerned about the cost. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for the product, but I'm not sure I can go much higher than that.

We understand your concerns regarding the pricing, Bob. Considering the value of the product and the competitive market, we are prepared to offer the product at $9500. This price reflects a fair compromise between our valuation of the product and your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $8750. This is the highest price I'm comfortable paying, and I believe it's a fair price for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We've considered your proposal carefully and are willing to agree on a price of $9000 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8750, but I'm still concerned about the price. I'd like to propose a final offer of $8600. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to agree on a price of $8800 for the product. We believe this price strikes a balance between the value of the product and your budget constraints.

I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm not sure I'm willing to go any higher than this. I'll make one final offer of $8500. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
